languages.text: "Мы гладиаторы, которые то выходят на арену, чтобы растерзать беспомощное мясо, то сами становятся им. Когда конец предопределен, — а на шпилях он всегда предопределен, — начинаешь смотреть на смерть проще. Перестаешь ее бояться и учишься наслаждаться жизнью. Мы — шайка наслаждающихся жизнью".

"We are gladiators — we go into the arena to rip helpless meat to shreds, then we become the helpless meat ourselves. When the end is predetermined — and in the spires, it's always predetermined — you start to see death in more simple terms. You stop being afraid of it and you learn to enjoy life. We are a gang of people who enjoy life."
languages.original_text: "Мы гладиаторы, которые то выходят на арену, чтобы растерзать беспомощное мясо, то сами становятся им. Когда конец предопределен, — а на шпилях он всегда предопределен, — начинаешь смотреть на смерть проще. Перестаешь ее бояться и учишься наслаждаться жизнью. Мы — шайка наслаждающихся жизнью".

When the end is predetermined — and in the spires, it's always predetermined — you start to see death in more simple terms. You stop being afraid of it and you learn to enjoy life. We are a gang of people who enjoy life."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “我们是角斗士。我们冲进竞技场里，把那些待宰羔羊撕成碎片，之后我们自己也会成为待宰羔羊。在尖塔里，所有人的结局都是注定的。既然如此，我们就会从更加简单的角度看待死亡。我们不再惧怕死亡，而是开始学会享受生活。我们就是一群享受生活的人。”
languages.original_text: "We are gladiators — we go into the arena to rip helpless meat to shreds, then we become the helpless meat ourselves. When the end is predetermined — and in the spires, it's always predetermined — you start to see death in more simple terms. You stop being afraid of it and you learn to enjoy life. We are a gang of people who enjoy life."

traits.locale_text: “我们是角斗士。我们冲进竞技场里，把那些待宰羔羊撕成碎片，之后我们自己也会成为待宰羔羊。在尖塔里，所有人的结局都是注定的。既然如此，我们就会从更加简单的角度看待死亡。我们不再惧怕死亡，而是开始学会享受生活。我们就是一群享受生活的人。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Somos gladiadores. Vamos a la arena a despedazar carne indefensa y luego nos convertimos en esa misma carne. Cuando el final está escrito, y aquí en las torres siempre lo está, empiezas a ver la muerte de forma más sencilla. Le pierdes el miedo y empiezas a disfrutar de la vida. Somos un grupo de gente que disfruta de la vida».
languages.original_text: "We are gladiators — we go into the arena to rip helpless meat to shreds, then we become the helpless meat ourselves. When the end is predetermined — and in the spires, it's always predetermined — you start to see death in more simple terms. You stop being afraid of it and you learn to enjoy life. We are a gang of people who enjoy life."

traits.locale_text: «Somos gladiadores. Vamos a la arena a despedazar carne indefensa y luego nos convertimos en esa misma carne. Cuando el final está escrito, y aquí en las torres siempre lo está, empiezas a ver la muerte de forma más sencilla. Le pierdes el miedo y empiezas a disfrutar de la vida. Somos un grupo de gente que disfruta de la vida».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「我々は剣闘士だ。闘技場で無力な肉塊を引き裂き、彼らと同じく肉塊になり果てる。尖塔にいるだけで死は確実なものだ。自分の終焉が定まっていると…死が単純明快なものに感じる。死を恐れなくなり、人生を楽しむようになる。我々はただ人生を楽しんでいるだけの集団だ」
languages.original_text: "We are gladiators — we go into the arena to rip helpless meat to shreds, then we become the helpless meat ourselves. When the end is predetermined — and in the spires, it's always predetermined — you start to see death in more simple terms. You stop being afraid of it and you learn to enjoy life. We are a gang of people who enjoy life."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は剣闘士だ。闘技場で無力な肉塊を引き裂き、彼らと同じく肉塊になり果てる。尖塔にいるだけで死は確実なものだ。自分の終焉が定まっていると…死が単純明快なものに感じる。死を恐れなくなり、人生を楽しむようになる。我々はただ人生を楽しんでいるだけの集団だ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Wir sind Gladiatoren — wir gehen in die Arena, um hilfloses Fleisch in Stücke zu reißen, dann werden wir selbst zum hilflosen Fleisch. Wenn das Ende vorherbestimmt ist, was in den Türmen immer der Fall ist, dann beginnt man, den Tod viel simpler zu sehen. Man hört auf, Angst davor zu haben, und lernt, das Leben zu genießen. Wir sind eine Bande von Leuten, die das Leben genießen."
languages.original_text: "We are gladiators — we go into the arena to rip helpless meat to shreds, then we become the helpless meat ourselves. When the end is predetermined — and in the spires, it's always predetermined — you start to see death in more simple terms. You stop being afraid of it and you learn to enjoy life. We are a gang of people who enjoy life."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind Gladiatoren — wir gehen in die Arena, um hilfloses Fleisch in Stücke zu reißen, dann werden wir selbst zum hilflosen Fleisch. Wenn das Ende vorherbestimmt ist, was in den Türmen immer der Fall ist, dann beginnt man, den Tod viel simpler zu sehen. Man hört auf, Angst davor zu haben, und lernt, das Leben zu genießen. Wir sind eine Bande von Leuten, die das Leben genießen."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Nous sommes des gladiateurs ; nous entrons dans l'arène pour tailler en pièces des morceaux de chair impuissants, après quoi nous prenons leur place. Lorsque la fin est prédéterminée, ce qui est immanquablement le cas dans les tours, on en vient à considérer la mort de façon bien plus simple. On cesse de la craindre et on apprend à profiter de la vie. Nous sommes simplement un groupe d'individus qui vivent au jour le jour. »
languages.original_text: "We are gladiators — we go into the arena to rip helpless meat to shreds, then we become the helpless meat ourselves. When the end is predetermined — and in the spires, it's always predetermined — you start to see death in more simple terms. You stop being afraid of it and you learn to enjoy life. We are a gang of people who enjoy life."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes des gladiateurs ; nous entrons dans l'arène pour tailler en pièces des morceaux de chair impuissants, après quoi nous prenons leur place. Lorsque la fin est prédéterminée, ce qui est immanquablement le cas dans les tours, on en vient à considérer la mort de façon bien plus simple. On cesse de la craindre et on apprend à profiter de la vie. Nous sommes simplement un groupe d'individus qui vivent au jour le jour. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Bizler gladyatörüz. Arenaya gidip âcizlerin etini kemiğinden ayırır, sonra da o âcizlerin yerini alırız. Sonun belliyse ki kulelerde hep bellidir, ölüme daha basit bir açıdan bakabiliyorsun. Ondan korkmuyor, hayattan zevk almaya bakıyorsun. Biz de hayattan zevk alan bir çeteyiz."
languages.original_text: "We are gladiators — we go into the arena to rip helpless meat to shreds, then we become the helpless meat ourselves. When the end is predetermined — and in the spires, it's always predetermined — you start to see death in more simple terms. You stop being afraid of it and you learn to enjoy life. We are a gang of people who enjoy life."

traits.locale_text: "Gladyatörüz biz. Arenaya gidip acizlerin etini kemiğinden ayırırız. Sonra da o acizlerin yerini biz alırız. Sonun belliyse ki kulelerde hep bellidir, ölüme daha basit bir açıdan bakabiliyorsun. Ondan korkmuyor, hayattan zevk almaya bakıyorsun. Biz de hayattan zevk alan bir çeteyiz."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
